ComicInfo.Summary:
EIGHTEEN FOREVER, PART ONE
The penultimate storyline of Grimm Fairy Tales begins! The Arcane Acre students rebel against their teachers in order to reunite with Lance and Skye. However, with Hailey missing and Ali in trouble, will their efforts prove fruitless? Also, Bloody Bones has made a dangerous new ally... and preparations for the final assault against the Nexus begin.
*List of covers and their creators:* Cover | Name | Creator(s) | Sidebar Location | -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- A | Cover A | Ian Richardson, devgear & Sean Ellery | 1 | B | Cover B | Renato Rei & Wes Hartman | 4 | C | Cover C | Michael Dooney & Jorge Cortes | 5 | D | Planet Comic Con Exclusive Variant Cover, Limited to 500 | Dawn McTigue & Ula Mos | 2 | E | Motor City Comic Con Exclusive Cover, Limited to 500 | David Nakayama | 3 | Note: The digital edition (5/4/2016) for this issue was released before the print edition.
